name: Ragged Straw Hat
data: It decreases the users strength a tiny bit.
It decreases the users dexterity poorly.
It increases the users wisdom poorly.
It increases the users intelligence a bit.
It has decent armour class for its type (little in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration an average amount.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It decreases the users fire resistance strongly.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'quick chant'.
